titles.title: Puerto Rico Hospital Medicare Reimbursement Equity Act of 2015
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide parity to Puerto Rico hospitals with respect to inpatient hospital payments under the Medicare program.
Puerto Rico Hospital Medicare Reimbursement Equity Act of 2015

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Puerto Rico Hospital Medicare Reimbursement Equity Act of 2015
Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to revise the formula for the Medicare inpatient hospital services payment rate for Puerto Rico hospitals to: (1) reduce the applicable Puerto Rico percentage from 25% to zero, and (2) increase the applicable federal percentage from 75% to 100%.
